00040 #define LAUNCH_RUN      1

00042 struct scheduler_plugin
00043 {
00044   int running_state;
00045   int category;
00046   int timeout;

00052   struct arglist *arglist;
00053   struct hash *parent_hash;
00054 };

00093 struct plugins_scheduler_struct
00094 {
00095   struct hash *hash;            /* Hash list of the plugins   */
00096   struct list *list[ACT_LAST + 1];      /* Linked list of the plugins */
00097   struct plist *plist;          /* Ports currently in use     */
00098 };
